aka: So Red and a Little Blue
trans_title: So Red and a Little Blue
introduction: 电脑，互联网，信息的碎片散落着，构成了小红(Red)和小蓝(Blue)的世界。他们见面时，脸So Red，心情是否也a little blue呢The fragments of information sca tter among the computer and Internet, and constitute the world of Red and Blue. When they meet each other, their face look so red, but whether their moods are a little blue?入围及上映Fête de l’anim /2017Annecy International Animated Film Festival /2017Melbourne International Animation Festival /2017New Chitose Airport International Animation Festival /2016The 12th Indie-AniFest ‘PANORAMA’ section /201615th Countryside Animafest Cyprus-Views of the World /2016Dum-D International Student Animation Festival /2016Annecy animation festival /2016Flatpack Film Festival /2016Holland Animation Film Festival /2016Anim!Arte /2015ANNY: Animation Nights New York /2015The Fourth China Independent Animation Film Forum /2015
